mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( nickname, email, password, op1, op2, answer1, answer2, token ) VALUES ( #{nickname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{op1}, #{op2}, #{answer1}, #{answer2}, #{token} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(nickname) AS RESULT FROM t_user WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT pid, nickname, email, password, op1, op2, answer1, answer2, token FROM t_user WHERE nickname = #{nickname} AND password = #{password}
